message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do $95, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
